Text:
Just FYI...this is the 1997 issue not the 1996 one.  Look at the copyright in the table of contents.
Also here's a site with the covers:
http://lampoon.rwinters.com/Lampoon1992-1998.htm

Thanks for the hard work!
@ txrabbit:  the copyright IS 1997, indeed, but this issue was released and on the newstands etc in '96.

Just to clarify, this one is considered to be 1997 issue, rather than 1996.  I double checked it with the copyrights withing the mag and the previously mentioned website.  I saw your comment to me on the 1997 upload, so I just wanted to post that I was correct here too.

Regardless, super job, look forward to the 1983-1990 uploads when they are available.
